-- | Very fast TagSoup parser.
--   
--   Works only with strict bytestrings. Correctly handles HTML
--   <tt>&lt;script&gt;</tt> and <tt>&lt;style&gt;</tt> tags.
--   
--   This module is intended to be used in conjunction with the original
--   <tt>tagsoup</tt> package:
--   
--   <pre>
--   import Text.HTML.TagSoup hiding (parseTags, renderTags)
--   import Text.HTML.TagSoup.Fast
--   </pre>
--   
--   Remark that tags are returned in lower case and comments are not
--   returned.
--   
--   In long running multithreaded applications it's generally recommended
--   to use <a>parseTagsT</a> and work with <tt>[</tt><a>Tag</a>
--   <tt>Text</tt><tt>]</tt> to reduce memory fragmentation.
module Text.HTML.TagSoup.Fast

-- | Parse a string to a list of tags.
--   
--   <pre>
--   parseTags "&lt;div&gt;&amp;amp;&lt;script&gt;x&lt;y&lt;/script&gt;" ==
--     [TagOpen "div" [],TagText "&amp;",TagOpen "script" [],TagText "x&lt;y",TagClose "script"]
--   </pre>
parseTags :: ByteString -> [Tag ByteString]

-- | Show a list of tags, as they might have been parsed.
renderTags :: [Tag ByteString] -> ByteString

-- | Alternative to <a>parseTags</a> working with <tt>Text</tt>
parseTagsT :: ByteString -> [Tag Text]

-- | Alternative to <a>renderTags</a> working with <tt>Text</tt>
renderTagsT :: [Tag Text] -> Text

-- | Decode XML to UTF-8 using <tt>encoding</tt> attribute of
--   <tt>&lt;?xml&gt;</tt> tag.
ensureUtf8Xml :: ByteString -> ByteString

-- | Escape characters unsafe to HTML
escapeHtml :: ByteString -> ByteString

-- | Alternative to <a>escapeHtml</a> working with <tt>Text</tt>
escapeHtmlT :: Text -> Text

-- | Convert escaped HTML to raw.
unescapeHtml :: ByteString -> ByteString

-- | Alternative to <a>unescapeHtml</a> working with <tt>Text</tt>
unescapeHtmlT :: Text -> Text
instance IsString Word8
